task.title: Checking your invalid document
task.shortdesc: The validation of your text against the appropriate XML schema for the document. If your document is invalid a pop-up will appear at the bottom of the page with a list of errors found in the document.

step.cmd: When you click on the "Validate" document and the document is invalid a pop-up appears with error messages.
Click on one of the error, this will highlight the error in the document. You can then correct the invalid structure.
step.info: You can still save the document if it is invalid, but a pop-up will appear making sure that you want to proceed.
